data.news_body: Further to our letter dated 20th January 2026 please be  informed that the Companys  material subsidiary M/s Sheffield Refractories Ltd UK has today i.e  26th January 2026 appointed  Hebblethwaites Chartered Accountants and Registered Auditors as their Statutory Auditors in accordance with applicable laws rules and regulations of United Kingdom. Hebblethwaites is an stablished firm of Chartered Accountants and Registered Auditors based in Sheffield South Yorkshire and they provide range of professional services including audit accounting tax and business advisory. This disclosure is also being hosted on Companys Website: https://ifglgroup.com/ and shall be available at link https://ifglgroup.com/investor/notice-announcements/ .

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: Kindly be informed that the Honble Supreme Court of India has to-day 6th January 2026 delivered a judgement thereby allowed Companys Special Leave Petition (Civil) No. 7013 of 2019 (IFGL Refractories Ltd Petitioner vs Orissa State Financial Corporation and Ors Respondents). While details of reliefs accorded by Honble Supreme Court are awaited as judgement delivered is yet to be received it is understood that Honble Supreme Court has allowed Companys claim for subsidies aggregating to Rs. 1114750/- (Rupees eleven lacs fourteen thousand seven hundred fifty only) together with interest thereon at the rate of 9% per annum since 2003 from the Respondents.

data.news_body: M/s Bajoria Financial Services Pvt Ltd (hereon BFSPL)  vide its letter dated 26th December 2025 has intimated that it has  filed a Report under Regulation 10(7) of SEBI (Substantial Acquisition of Shares and Takeovers) Regulations 2011 with Securities and Exchange Board of India in respect of its acquisition of 437490 Equity Shares  of Rs. 10/- each fully paid-up of IFGL Refractories Limited (hereon the Company) from Mr Mihir Prakash Bajoria (hereon MPB). Both BFSPL and MPB are part of Promoter Group of the Company. While the Company is mandatorily not required to disseminate said letter  of BFSPL under Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015 the Company as a matter of  abundant precaution enclosing herewith copy of said letter of   BFSPL and Report forming part thereof.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Clause 7 of Para A of Part A of Schedule III of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (SEBI LODR 2015) kindly be informed that Mr. Abhay Kapoor son of Mr. Govind Ram Kapoor has been appointed as the Chief Human Resource Officer (CHRO) of the Company with effect from Wednesday 17th December 2025. Mr. Kapoor holds a Bachelors degree in Science (Mathematics) an MBA in HR (PMIR) and an LLB. He brings with him more than 25 years of rich experience in Strategic HR HR Operation and Industrial Relation with expertise in Organisation Development & optimal Human Resource Development & utilization. Because of aforesaid appointment Dr. Sushil Kumar Ojha being Senior General Manager - HR of the Company has ceased to be the Senior Management Personnel in terms of SEBI LODR 2015. Dr Ojha will now report to CHRO Mr. Abhay Kapoor.

data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 this is to inform you that CFC Finlease Private Limited (CFC Finlease) a SEBI registered ESG Rating Provider has voluntarily assigned an ESG rating of 60to the Company. 
Please note that the Company has not engaged CFC Finlease for ESG Rating. CFC Finlease independently prepared their Report based on data pertaining to Company available in public domain.  The Company came to know thereabout through an email intimation from BSE Limited on 21st October 2025 that CFC Finlease has submitted ESG disclosure on the Company. 
This announcement is also being hosted on Companys Website: https://ifglgroup.com/ at link https://ifglgroup.com/investor/announcement .

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Disclosure Under Regulations 30 And 33 Of SEBI LODR Regulations, 2015 - Audited Financial Results For Year Ended On 31St March, 2023 And Recommendation For Final Dividend
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company in their meeting held to-day have approved and taken on
record financial results, both on stand alone and consolidated basis, for quarter/year ended on 31st
March, 2023 audited by the Company''s Statutory Auditors, M/s S R Batliboi & Co. LLP and
reviewed by Company''s Audit Committee in their meeting also held earlier today.

In the aforesaid meeting following Company''s Policy on Dividend Distribution, the Board also
resolved to recommend payment of Final Dividend of 70 % (Rs 7 per Equity Share of Rs IO each
face value) for FY 2022-23, subject to necessary approvals/permissions including shareholders of
the Company at their ensuing Annual General Meeting.

The Board Meeting commenced at 12.20 Hours and concluded at 14.50 Hours.
